This repository contains code used in EE 588: Coastal Biogeochemistry, taught by Robinson W. Fulweiler.

<center><h2>Directory Structure</h2></center>

<h3>/figures</h3> .png figures
  
<h3>/export</h3> .csv files of summary and statistical results

<h3>/raw</h3> Raw input files in .csv or .xlsx format
  
<h3>/Rdata</h3> .rds and .Rdata files of tidied data
  
<h3>/scripts</h3> R scripts that import data, perform graphing, and summarize.
